class.author: Gloria Corti
class.desc: Physics Analysis Particle. A chosen hypotesis for a possible candidate particle.
class.name: Particle

attribute.desc: Point at which the momentum is given in LHCb reference frame
attribute.name: pointOnTrack

method.desc: Set covariance matrix relative to momentum (4x4) and propagate to (sx, sy, P)
method.name: setMomentumErr

attribute.desc: Covariance matrix relative to point at which the momentum is given (3x3)
attribute.name: pointOnTrackErr

attribute.desc: Matrix with correlation errors between momemtum and pointOnTrack (momentum x point)
attribute.name: posMomCorr

method.desc: Set matrix with correlation errors between momemtum and pointOnTrack (momentum x point)
method.name: setPosMomCorr

attribute.desc: Describe if a particle flies or not (i.e. is a resonance) and its product should be taken if used in a vertex
attribute.name: isResonance

relation.desc: Reference to originator (ProtoParticle, MCParticle for smearing, or AxPartCandidate for Zebra DST). Void for composite particles
relation.name: origin

method.desc: Charge in units of +e (i.e. electron charge = -1.0), temporarly it works only for basic particles
method.name: charge

method.desc: Retrieve slopeX from momentum - line rapresentation of a Particle
method.name: slopeX

method.desc: Retrieve slopeY from momentum - line rapresentaion of a Particle
method.name: slopeY

method.desc: Set error matrix on (slopeX, slopeY, P) and propagate to momentum
method.name: setSlopesMomErr

attribute.desc: Correlation matrix with errors between (slopeX, slopeY, P) and pointOnTrack
attribute.name: posSlopesCorr

method.desc: Set correlation matrix with errors between (slopeX, slopeY, P) and pointOnTrack and propagate to posMomCorr
method.name: setPosSlopesCorr

attribute.desc: internal flag for location relative to physdesktop
attribute.name: desktop
